text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 15px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: There are three common measures of central tendency: (i) the arithmetic mean- simply the mean,

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 40px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer; fill-opacity: 1;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 15px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana; cursor: pointer; fill-opacity: 1;
text.tspan: To calculate the mean of n numbers, take the sum of the n numbers and divide it by n.

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 15px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 15px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: For the five numbers 8, 4, 7, 12, and 4, the mean is

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 15px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 15px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 15px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 15px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: The mean can be affected by just a few values that lie far above or below the rest of the data,

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 15px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: because these values contribute directly to the sum of the data and therefore to the mean.

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 15px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: For Example the mean of 4 numbers 3,6,9,10 is 3 +6 +9 +10 /4 = 7 where as the mean of 3 ,6 ,9 ,10 and 97 is 25

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 15px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: where the mean is significantly affected by the inclusion of value 97
